TopicTitle: Just purchased and stuck on loading screen. Mac OS

Articles.Content:
As said in the title, I purchased from the website and i cannot get passed the loading screen where it says 'loading asset bundle definitions'.

 

My Mac is a MacBook Pro mid 2012 running Sierra 10.12 and these are the specs. 

 

2.9 GHz Intel Core i7

8 GB 1600 MHz DDR3

Intel HD Graphics 4000 1536 MB

 

Im not the best on computers so please bear with me.

Thanks, Ive tried this but to no success!! 

 

Just to clarify; Right click on the KSP folder in applications and then copy. Paste in desktop, then move back to applications then try to run the KSP icon. 

 

Nothing has changed in that sense with the stuck on the loading screen, but when running the launcher app the play button is just in grey and the update and settings are able to be clicked and in blue.

Yes that should work. But try this:
If you open the app bundle by right clicking on it and navigating the internal structure to the MacOS folder and run the executable directly, the game runs as normal.

Hello, I just purchased a new macbook pro and I too am having this same problem as mentioned by Russtysheriffs

On 11/13/2016 at 1:28 PM, Russtysheriffs said:

Thanks, Ive tried this but to no success!! 

 

Just to clarify; Right click on the KSP folder in applications and then copy. Paste in desktop, then move back to applications then try to run the KSP icon. 

 

Nothing has changed in that sense with the stuck on the loading screen, but when running the launcher app the play button is just in grey and the update and settings are able to be clicked and in blue.
